article: This is  _  news for children in the countryside. We may still remember the girl  _  big eyes. Her big eyes are  _  us her dream: I wish to  go to school  ! In China, there are still  a lot of  girls and boys like her. They want to go to school, but their  _  are too poor. If the family has two or three children, parents  _  send them all to school. So they often ask  girls  to stay at home, and boys to go to school. Now they needn't  worry about  the money. From 2006 on, children can go to school  for free  in poor areas. They don't have to  pay for  books and other things. Some of them can even get  _  from the government to make their life better. Soon,  _  children in the countryside can go to school for free. All families are very  _  with the news. It is  _  great.
